title: Lights Out
description: Survival in a post-apocalyptic America.The protagonist, Mark Turner, is a very resourceful individual, but he has never been a prepper. When an EMP attack across most of America puts the "Lights Out" completely, he has to make a major shift in the way he and his family live. The book begins right away with the EMP, and follows Mark, his family, and his friends through the tough process of survival.
author: HalfFast
